3: You see supplementary data blocks here and there in this area. After walking for some time, you see another data blockade standing in your way.
...So this space was intentionally separated as a storage space for all the supplementary data blocks?
Well... I guess we'll just have to do the same thing again.
The space behind the blockade becomes accessible again when the blockade is deactivated.
'Bianca' is most likely... just right up ahead.
Let's go. Brace yourself. I've got a feeling that it's not going to be the smoothest ride.
